excerpt: "A promise of dialogue between the Cuban government and artists calling for greater freedom of expression seems to have stalled, after communist authorities blamed a protest on US interference. Unprecedented discussions were expected to get underway this week between Culture Minister Alpidio Alonso and artist representatives,"
